metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to air barrier systems for buildings
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to air barrier systems for buildings

requirements.description: Air barrier materials may include polyethylene, housewrap, building paper, rigid insulation, spray foam, drywall, or other approved materials
requirements.exact_quote: Air barrier materials may include polyethylene, housewrap, building paper, rigid insulation, spray foam, drywall, or other approved materials

requirements.description: Maximum air permeance for air barrier materials
requirements.exact_quote: Air barrier materials shall have an air permeance of not more than 0.02 L/(s*m2) at 75 Pa when tested in accordance with ASTM E2178

requirements.description: Air barrier materials shall be tested in accordance with ASTM E2178
requirements.exact_quote: when tested in accordance with ASTM E2178

requirements.description: Housewrap used as air barrier material shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.32-M
requirements.exact_quote: Housewrap used as air barrier material shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.32-M or shall have equivalent air resistance properties

requirements.description: The air barrier system shall be continuous over the entire building envelope
requirements.exact_quote: The air barrier system shall be continuous over the entire building envelope including walls, ceilings, floors, windows, and doors

requirements.description: Where floor assemblies interrupt wall assemblies, the air barrier shall be continuous across the floor assembly
requirements.exact_quote: Where floor assemblies interrupt wall assemblies, the air barrier shall be continuous across the floor assembly

requirements.description: Minimum lap for polyethylene air barrier joints
requirements.exact_quote: Joints in polyethylene air barriers shall be lapped not less than 100 mm

requirements.description: Minimum lap for housewrap horizontal joints
requirements.exact_quote: Horizontal joints in housewrap shall be lapped not less than 75 mm

requirements.description: Minimum lap for housewrap vertical joints
requirements.exact_quote: Vertical joints in housewrap shall be lapped not less than 150 mm

requirements.description: Joints in air barrier materials shall be sealed with tape, caulking, or other approved sealants
requirements.exact_quote: Joints in air barrier materials shall be sealed with tape, caulking, or other approved sealants

requirements.description: All penetrations through the air barrier shall be sealed with caulking, gaskets, or other appropriate materials
requirements.exact_quote: All penetrations through the air barrier shall be sealed with caulking, gaskets, or other appropriate materials

requirements.description: Electrical boxes in the air barrier shall be sealed with gaskets or sealed to the air barrier material
requirements.exact_quote: Electrical boxes in the air barrier shall be sealed with gaskets or sealed to the air barrier material

requirements.description: Window and door frames shall be sealed to the air barrier system
requirements.exact_quote: Window and door frames shall be sealed to the air barrier system to maintain continuity

requirements.description: Air barrier materials shall be supported to resist air pressure differentials without damage or displacement
requirements.exact_quote: Air barrier materials shall be supported to resist air pressure differentials without damage or displacement

requirements.description: A second plane of protection shall be provided behind cladding in locations where the Moisture Index is greater than 1.0
requirements.exact_quote: A second plane of protection shall be provided behind cladding in locations where the Moisture Index is greater than 1.0

requirements.description: Moisture Index threshold above which second plane of protection is required
requirements.exact_quote: where the Moisture Index is greater than 1.0

requirements.description: The second plane of protection shall consist of sheathing membrane, building paper, or equivalent water-resistant material
requirements.exact_quote: The second plane of protection shall consist of sheathing membrane, building paper, or equivalent water-resistant material

requirements.description: The second plane of protection shall be detailed to drain water that penetrates the cladding to the exterior
requirements.exact_quote: The second plane of protection shall be detailed to drain water that penetrates the cladding to the exterior

requirements.description: Minimum drainage space behind cladding for rainscreen walls
requirements.exact_quote: Rainscreen walls shall have a minimum drainage space of 10 mm behind the cladding

requirements.description: The drainage space shall be vented at the top and bottom of the wall to promote drying
requirements.exact_quote: The drainage space shall be vented at the top and bottom of the wall to promote drying
